original_title: The Further Adventures of Tennessee Buck
overview: Ken Manchester (Brant von Hoffman) and his beautiful rich wife Barbara Manchester (Kathy Shower) wire the drunk adventurer Buck Malone (David Keith) to take them on a hunting expedition in the jungle. However, the true purpose of the expedition was not just hunting.
tagline: Headhunters! Cannibals! Killers! And if he survives... love.
title: The Further Adventures of Tennessee Buck
